name: Handmade Artisan Ceramic Pendant in Plum PLUMP5
description:
This beautiful handmade artisan ceramic pendant measures 1 1/8 inch and was made from low fire white clay that I handcrafted, decorated, glazed with multiple colors and fired in my studio.  This pendant is also glazed on the back.

Because I handcraft each item individually there may be minor differences in size or design in each piece. These subtle variations add to the uniqueness and charm of my work.

Thank you for buying handmade!

Like our Facebook page to get all the updates on new items and sales!  www.facebook.com/whitecloverkiln

name: Handmade Artisan Ceramic Button in Mint Chocolate MINTCHOCB821
description:
This beautiful handmade artisan ceramic button measures 1 3/8 inches and would be perfect for embellishing your sewing or needlework project.

This button was made from Porcelain clay that I handcrafted, decorated, glazed with multiple colors and fired in my studio to over 2200 degrees.  The back is unglazed.

Because I handcraft each item individually there may be minor differences in size or design in each piece. These subtle variations add to the uniqueness and charm of my work.

Thank you for buying handmade!

Like our Facebook page to get all the updates on new items and sales!  www.facebook.com/whitecloverkiln

name: Handmade Artisan Ceramic Pendant in Deep Pacific on Russet DEEPPRP3
description:
This beautiful handmade artisan ceramic pendant measures 1 3/8 inch and was made from earthenware clay that I handcrafted, decorated, glazed with multiple colors and fired in my studio.  This pendant is also glazed on the back.
